component.name: Sysdupd
component.summary: A GNOME and full system updater

description.p: Sysdupd is a GNOME and full system updater, showing available updates on various Linux distributions.

It is themed with GTK4 / libadwaita and provides a layout similar to Windows updates, with tweakable options. The application gives a notification when updates are done and can prompt for a system restart.
